column4: hello, I added a new SATA disk 1TB to my ubuntu, I'm trying to create a format using parted and fdisk, I create the start cyl 1 but what is the last cyl to occupy 1TB ?
you've made it incorrectly, its supposed to be /dev/sda not /dev/sda3
why ? the new disk is sda3
are there any other scsi/sata/usb storage devices plugged in on the same computer?
I'm afraid to format the currently installed one
the reason is this:ã€€Disk /dev/sda3: 5033 MB, 5033871360 bytes
would've been better if you did fdisk -l instead
that's the wrong disk, note the size of the disk, 160GB not 1TB and so you've created a virtual partition or whatever it is inside /dev/sda3 which is swap
how can I know what dev name the new disk took ?
